text: marshal_edward_mars Do n't trust her . She 's dangerous .
dr_jack_shephard You should try not to move , man .
marshal_edward_mars Have to find her . Have to bring her back .

dr_jack_shephard Yeah , you keep saying that . And every time I ask you who you have to bring back you pass out on me again . Since your fever 's running pretty high , I 'm guessing you have no idea who you 're talking about .
marshal_edward_mars My cuffs , my handcuffs . Where are my cuffs ?
dr_jack_shephard What ?
marshal_edward_mars My jacket pocket .
dr_jack_shephard I do n't ... .
marshal_edward_mars Jacket pocket .
dr_jack_shephard Okay .
marshal_edward_mars Dangerous . She 's dangerous .
boone_carlyle It 's getting dark .
james_ford Then pick up the pace .
boone_carlyle Hick .
james_ford Little louder ?
sayid_jarrah We should make camp .
shannon_rutherford What , here ?
sayid_jarrah Yes , here .
james_ford I 'm not stopping . You all have a nice cookout .
sayid_jarrah Excellent , walk through the jungle in the dark .
james_ford Oooo , afraid the trees are going to get us ?
sayid_jarrah No , what is knocking down the trees will get you .
james_ford Well , if you 're so worried about me , how about you give me the clip back ?
kate_austen Put the gun back in your pants , Sawyer . Sayid 's right , if you keep walking you 're not going to make it to the beach .
james_ford Yeah , why 's that ?
kate_austen Trust me .
sayid_jarrah This is Australia . This is us .
james_ford Nice stick .

sayid_jarrah Two days ago we take off from Sydney . We fly along the same north east route every commercial airliner bound for Los Angeles does . Now the pilot , he said he lost communication with the ground , correct ?
kate_austen Yeah , 6 hours in . He turned around and headed for Fiji .
sayid_jarrah So , we changed course . Regrettably , no one knew we changed course . The turbulence hit . We know the rest .
kate_austen The pilot said we were over a thousand miles off course .
charlie_pace Yeah , but , they 'll find us . They have satellites in space that can take pictures of your license plate .
sayid_jarrah If only we were all wearing license plates .
charlie_pace Well , are n't you the pessimist .
sayid_jarrah Basic photography - point and shoot . Satellites can shoot , but they must be told where to point .
charlie_pace Oh . Bollocks .

james_ford Okay , really enjoyed the puppet show . Fantastic . But we 're stuck in the middle of damn nowhere . How about we talk about that other thing ? You know that transmission Abdul picked up on his little radio ? The French chick that said , """" They 're all dead . """" The transmission 's been on a loop for … how long was it , Freckles ?
kate_austen 16 years .
james_ford Right . Let 's talk about that .
boone_carlyle Well , we have to tell the others when we get back .
shannon_rutherford Tell them what , exactly ?
boone_carlyle What we heard .
shannon_rutherford You did n't hear anything . I 'm not a stupid translator .

sayid_jarrah No one 's going to tell them anything . To relay what we heard without fully understanding it will cause a panic . If we tell them what we know we take away their hope . And hope is a very dangerous thing to lose .
kate_austen So we lie .
hugo_reyes Was it a dinosaur ?
dr_jack_shephard It was n't a dinosaur .
hugo_reyes You say you did n't see it .
dr_jack_shephard I did n't .
hugo_reyes So how do you know it was n't a dinosaur ?
dr_jack_shephard Because dinosaurs are extinct .
hugo_reyes Oh . Yeah . So what 's his story ? He looks kind of ... dying .
dr_jack_shephard He 's not going to die .
hugo_reyes He 's yellow , man .
dr_jack_shephard His wound is infected , but the antibiotics will fight it off .
hugo_reyes What if they do n't ?
dr_jack_shephard Then his body will shut down one piece at a time . His abdomen goes rigid , then ... .
hugo_reyes He looks like he 's in pain .
dr_jack_shephard Yeah .
hugo_reyes What 's this ? Uh , dude ? Uh ... What do you think she did ?
dr_jack_shephard It 's none of my business .
hugo_reyes She looks pretty hard core .
dr_jack_shephard Hurley ... .
sayid_jarrah What are you doing ?
boone_carlyle Standing guard . You heard what they said is out there .
james_ford You took my gun off me , boy ?
shannon_rutherford Please , you 've never even held a gun . He does n't believe in guns . He 's goes on marches .
boone_carlyle I do n't go on marches .
sayid_jarrah Give it back to me .
james_ford Yeah , give it to Al Jazeera , he 'll protect us .
charlie_pace Al Jazeera is a network .
boone_carlyle I 'll keep the damn gun .
shannon_rutherford We should give it to her .
charlie_pace Yeah , Kate should hold the gun .
sayid_jarrah Fine with me . Well ?
ray_mullen Good morning .
kate_austen Morning .
ray_mullen You were sleeping in my sheep pen .
kate_austen Sorry .
ray_mullen How 'd you get here ?
kate_austen I walked .
ray_mullen You walked ?
kate_austen Yeah .
ray_mullen From where ?
kate_austen Town .
ray_mullen Nearest town 's 15 kilometers .
kate_austen Maybe that 's why I was so exhausted .
ray_mullen What 's your name ?
kate_austen Annie .
ray_mullen You hungry , Annie ?
ray_mullen So you want to tell me why you 're trespassing on my property ?
kate_austen I ran out of money .
ray_mullen You 're an American .

kate_austen Canadian . I graduated from college and figured I 'd see the world . Australia was top of my list so I hopped a flight to Melbourne but I do n't know anybody here so I figured I 'd walk for awhile , you know .
ray_mullen Melbourne 's 100 kilometers from here .
kate_austen I like walking .
ray_mullen And you just happened to wonder onto my farm .
kate_austen I like farms , too .
ray_mullen Do you know how to work one ?
kate_austen Yeah .
ray_mullen My wife died 8 months ago Wednesday . She left me with too many chores and a hell of a mortgage . If you help me with the first one , I 'll give you a fair wage and a place to stay .
kate_austen Deal .
ray_mullen No . I 'm a lefty .
hugo_reyes Dude , dude , they 're back .

sayid_jarrah As you and the others know , we hiked up the mountain in an attempt to help the rescue team locate us . The transceiver failed to pick up a signal . We were n't able to send out a call for help . But we 're not giving up . If we gather electronic equipment - your cell phones , laptops - I can boost the signal and we can try again , but that may take some time . So for now , we should begin rationing our remaining food . If it rains , we should set up tarps to collect water . I need to organize 3 separate groups . Each group should have a leader . One group for water - I 'll organize that . Who 's going to organize electronics ? You ? Rationing food ? Okay . And I believe a third group should concern themselves with the construction of ... .
kate_austen Hi .
dr_jack_shephard Hey .
kate_austen I , um , I need to tell you something .
dr_jack_shephard Okay , sure .

kate_austen We could n't send out a signal because there was another signal blocking it . The other signal - we heard it . It was a distress call from a French woman . She said that the others were dead - something had killed them all . She was alone on the Island . It 's been playing for 16 years , Jack . I wanted to tell you .
dr_jack_shephard Anything else ?
kate_austen How is he - the man with the shrapnel in his side ?
dr_jack_shephard It 's touch - and - go .
kate_austen He wake up ?
dr_jack_shephard No , just for a few seconds during the surgery .
kate_austen He say anything ?
dr_jack_shephard No .
hugo_reyes So what 'd she say ?
dr_jack_shephard She did n't say anything .
hugo_reyes But you told her you knew ?
dr_jack_shephard I do n't know anything .
hugo_reyes Well , you kind of know she 's in that mug shot . And that we found those handcuffs . And that guy keeps mumbling """" she 's dangerous , she 's dangerous """" over and over .
dr_jack_shephard It 's not my business . Not my problem .
hugo_reyes Yeah , you 're right . We 'll let Johnny Fever take care of her when he gets better .
dr_jack_shephard He 's not getting better if we do n't get some stronger antibiotics .
hugo_reyes That stuff I got from the luggage ... .
dr_jack_shephard It 's for ear infections and foot fungus .
hugo_reyes We went through everything , man .
dr_jack_shephard What about that luggage in the overhead compartments ?
hugo_reyes That 's inside the plane .
dr_jack_shephard Yeah ?
hugo_reyes But , the bodies are in there , and they 're all ... dead .
dr_jack_shephard Look , I 'll handle it . Why do n't you keep an eye on him ... ?
hugo_reyes Great . Yeah - love to - on it .
james_ford Boo .
dr_jack_shephard What are you doing in here ?
james_ford Trick or treat , same as you .
dr_jack_shephard You 're looting .
james_ford Aww , you say potato ... .
dr_jack_shephard What 's in the bag ?
james_ford Booze , smokes , couple of Playboys . What 's in yours ?
dr_jack_shephard Medicine .
james_ford Well , that about sums it up , do n't it ?
dr_jack_shephard Do you do this back home , too - steal from the dead ?

james_ford Brother , you 've to got wake up and smell the bull crap here , rescue ai n't comin ' . You 're just wasting your time . You 're trying to save a guy who last time I checked had a piece of metal the size of my head sticking out of his bread basket . Let me ask you something ? How many of those pills are you going to use to fix him up ?
dr_jack_shephard As many as it takes .
james_ford Yeah ? How many you got ? You 're just not looking at the big picture , Doc . You 're still back in civilization .
dr_jack_shephard Yeah ? And where are you ?
james_ford Me ? I 'm in the wild .
charlie_pace Whoa , hey , I got it . I got it .
claire_littleton Thanks .
charlie_pace Well , look on the bright side . Whoever 's this was is probably better off than we are . I got it .
sunhwa_kwon 여기 … 당신 가방 찾은 것 같아요 !
jinsoo_kwon 그래 ? 보자. 아니야.
sunhwa_kwon 그럼 계속 찾아볼게요.
jinsoo_kwon 잠깐 , 이리 와 봐. 니 모습 좀 봤니 ? 니 옷하고 얼굴이 너무 더러워 보여. 빨리 씻어라. 자기야. 사랑해.
charlie_pace So , how 's the baby ?
claire_littleton It 's okay , I think .
charlie_pace Good . So , your husband . Was he on the flight ?
claire_littleton Oh , no . I 'm not married .
charlie_pace Oh .
claire_littleton I know - how modern of me .
charlie_pace Well , who needs men , right ? Bloody useless .
claire_littleton So , you guys hiked all the way up that mountain for nothing , huh ?
kate_austen Hey , sorry .
hugo_reyes I was going to get some more water .
kate_austen We have n't met . I 'm Kate .
hugo_reyes Hi , Kate .
kate_austen Hi .
hugo_reyes Hurley .
kate_austen I was just looking for Jack and I thought he might be in there .
hugo_reyes Yeah , no . Uh , he went to go get some medicine ... over there .
kate_austen Where ? In the fuselage ?
hugo_reyes What ? Yeah , in the uh , uh , you know ? I 've got to get that water .
ray_mullen The bank would have given you a heck of a toaster if you had kept that in a savings account .
kate_austen What do I need a toaster for ?
ray_mullen You 're hiding your wages in a tin can , Annie . I mean , I would have held on to it for you .
kate_austen I got trust issues .
ray_mullen Were n't you going to say goodbye ?
kate_austen Wrote you a note .

ray_mullen You 've been here almost 3 months , Annie . And every time I ask you about yourself , you get that look in your eye . Yeah , that one . So , I mind my own business . I figured maybe you got off on the wrong side of a bad relationship . Maybe you ran . I always knew you 'd leave here someday . I guess I hoped it would n't be in the middle of the night .
kate_austen I 'm sorry .
ray_mullen Yeah , so am I.
ray_mullen Hey , Annie , why do n't you just stay one more night , eh ? I 'll drive you to the train station first thing in the morning . I promise .
kate_austen Okay .
ray_mullen I get it , you know . Everyone deserves a fresh start .
dr_jack_shephard Damn it . Damn it .
dr_jack_shephard Just breathe . Come on , come on , look , look at me , look . What did you do ?
kate_austen I was just checking to if he was ... he jumped on me . He grabbed me . Is he ... okay ?
dr_jack_shephard He 's not responding to antibiotics , he 's bleeding internally , his fever 's pushing 104 . And his abdomen 's rigid . He needs water .
kate_austen So , what are you going to do about it ?
dr_jack_shephard About what ?
kate_austen About him .
dr_jack_shephard I told you , he needs water .
kate_austen Will he suffer ?
dr_jack_shephard What ?
kate_austen Will it be quick ?
dr_jack_shephard No . It wo n't be quick . 2 , 3 , maybe 4 days .
kate_austen And he 'll feel it ?
dr_jack_shephard Yeah , he 'll feel it .
kate_austen Ca n't you put him out of his misery ?
dr_jack_shephard I saw your mug shot , Kate . I am not a murderer .
ray_mullen Do they listen to Patsy Cline in Canada ?
kate_austen They listen to Patsy Cline everywhere .
ray_mullen You hungry ?
kate_austen I 'll eat on the train .
ray_mullen You sure ? There 's a little place up here that makes a mean burger .
kate_austen What are you looking for , Ray ?
ray_mullen What ?
kate_austen How long have you known ?
ray_mullen Couple of days . I saw your picture in the post office . I guess they knew you were Down Under .
kate_austen Why ?
ray_mullen The reward 's 23,000 dollars . I told you when I met you , I 've got a hell of a mortgage . If it makes you feel any better , it was a hard decision , Annie .
kate_austen My name 's not Annie .
michael_dawson Hey , who was that guy you were hanging out with ?
walt_lloyd What guy ?
michael_dawson The bald guy .
walt_lloyd Oh , Mr. Locke ?
michael_dawson Mr. Locke got any kids ?
walt_lloyd He did n't say .
michael_dawson Yeah , what did he say ?
walt_lloyd I do n't know .
michael_dawson What do you mean you do n't know . What did he say ?
walt_lloyd Some of it 's secret .
michael_dawson Did he tell you not to tell me ?
walt_lloyd No .
michael_dawson Then what 's the secret ?
walt_lloyd Mr. Locke said a miracle happened to him .
michael_dawson Yeah , well , a miracle happened to all of us , Walt . We survived a plane crash . Look , I do n't want you hanging around with him anymore .
walt_lloyd Why not ? He 's my friend .
michael_dawson Hey , I 'm your friend , too .
walt_lloyd If you were my friend , you 'd find Vincent .
michael_dawson Walt , look , I have n't given up on your dog . I 'm going to do everything I can to find him .
walt_lloyd No you wo n't .
michael_dawson Yeah , Walt , I will .
walt_lloyd You do n't care about Vincent .
michael_dawson I 'm going to get your dog back as soon as it stops raining . Hey listen to me , I 'm going to get your dog back .
michael_dawson Yeah , soon as it stops raining - good , nice . I 'm going to find your dog ... yeah , I 'm just going to go walking through the haunted damn jungle looking for your ... Vincent ?
michael_dawson Vincent ? That you buddy ?

michael_dawson Oh . Something was chasing me so , uh .. I do n't hear it now . But you should probably head back . Uh , I did n't see anything , you know , if you 're worried about it ... I did n't see anything .
charlie_pace What are you making ?
john_locke Whistle .
charlie_pace I used some tribal flutes once in a recording session . I 'm in a band .
shannon_rutherford I wish he would just die already .
boone_carlyle Real humane , Shannon .
sayid_jarrah Anything I can do to help ?
dr_jack_shephard No , I 'm good , thanks .
sayid_jarrah The others are getting upset . They want to know what 's going on inside the tent .
dr_jack_shephard Trying to save his life .
sayid_jarrah Rumor has it you ca n't .
james_ford Need a light ?
james_ford Came by to thank you . You going to ask what for ?
kate_austen What for ?
james_ford For taking that gun away from me .
kate_austen I did n't take it away from you .

james_ford It 's sticking out of your denims , ai n't it ? I sure would n't want to be the one with that gun right now . Because everyone sitting out there listening to that poor boy scream all night knows what 's got to be done . Only one that can do it is the one with that gun . Do n't act so surprised . I heard you tell the hero the same thing . Hell , there 's only one bullet left - be damned near poetic .
marshal_edward_mars Listen to me .
dr_jack_shephard No , you need to keep quiet .
marshal_edward_mars Listen to me , no matter what she does - no matter how she makes you feel , do n't you trust a word that she says . She will do anything to get away .
dr_jack_shephard What did she do ?
marshal_edward_mars I want to talk to her .
dr_jack_shephard Tell me what she did .
marshal_edward_mars I want to talk to her , alone . She got to you , too , huh ?
marshal_edward_mars Hey , Kate .
marshal_edward_mars What was it ?
kate_austen What ?
marshal_edward_mars The favor .
kate_austen I do n't know what you 're talking about .
marshal_edward_mars The last thing I heard before the crash - you wanted a favor .
kate_austen I have one favor to ask .
marshal_edward_mars Really ? This ought to be good .
marshal_edward_mars Well ?
kate_austen I wanted you to make sure that Ray Mullen got his 23 grand .
marshal_edward_mars What — the guy who ratted you out ?
kate_austen He had a hell of a mortgage .
marshal_edward_mars You really are one of a kind . You know , you would have got away if you had n't saved him .
kate_austen In case you had n't noticed , I did get away .
marshal_edward_mars You do n't look free to me . Kate , I 'm going to die , right ?
kate_austen Yeah .
marshal_edward_mars So , are you going to do it , or what ?
hugo_reyes Yo , so , where 's the fugitive ?
dr_jack_shephard In the tent .
hugo_reyes You let her in there alone ?
dr_jack_shephard What 's she going to do ? She 's 120 pounds soaking wet .
hugo_reyes Yeah , but she 's got that gun .
dr_jack_shephard What ?
hugo_reyes She 's strapped , man . I saw it in her ... . in her ... . in her ... . in her ... .
dr_jack_shephard Kate ? !
dr_jack_shephard What did you do ?

james_ford What you could n't . Look , I get where you 're coming from being a doctor and all , but he wanted it . Hell , he asked me . So , I do n't like it any more than you do , but something had to be done .
hugo_reyes Oh , no way . Guys ?
dr_jack_shephard You shot him in the chest ?
james_ford I was aiming for his heart .
dr_jack_shephard You missed .
hugo_reyes Man , is he still breathing ?
dr_jack_shephard You perforated his lung . It 'll take hours to bleed out .
james_ford So what is — I only had one bullet .
dr_jack_shephard Get out . Get out !
hugo_reyes Oh boy .
james_ford Damn it !
john_locke I found your son 's dog .
michael_dawson What ?
john_locke Vincent - I tethered him to a tree just over there . I know that Walt lost his mom . I thought that you should be the one to bring his dog back to him .
michael_dawson Hey , thanks .
john_locke Welcome .
kate_austen I want to tell you what I did - why he was after me .

dr_jack_shephard I do n't want to know . It does n't matter , Kate , who we were - what we did before this , before the crash . It does n't really ... 3 days ago we all died . We should all be able to start over .
kate_austen Okay .
dr_jack_shephard Okay .
